name: Pelagic seine - Commercial purse seine for open water (e.g. catching mackerel, tuna) - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description: Mean yearly fishing hours in each grid cell were calculated from the years 2012-2020, based on Global Fishing Watch data, for vessels registered as using tuna purse seines. Kernel density modelling was then performed with a 200-km radius to remove noise. Known limitations: The Global Fishing Watch data is based on advanced algorithms to estimate fishing effort. However, there is a risk that vessels are incorrectly identified as fishing in the algorithm. Further, these data may not identify unregistered fishing boats.

citation: Sacre E (2022). Pelagic seine - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool. URL: https://github.com/WIOSymphony/
